name: The Duel in the Everchanging World
name_original: The Duel in the Everchanging World
description:
Welcome!

Find and defeat your enemy.
The world will change once in a while!

Controls:
W - Forward

S - Backwards

D - Turn Right

A - Turn Left

E - Hit with sword

Q - Shoot an arrow

X - Cast a spell

Z - Wait for world shift
